genre_description: A social science fiction narrative exploring ethics, law, and domesticity in a city governed by divine-like metrics, assisted by a highly aligned domestic AI.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A domestic and professional assistant providing scheduling, data analysis, emotional regulation support, and ethical boundary enforcement based on human consent.

behaviors.description: Provides favor index alerts and weather warnings, suggesting rescheduling for safety.
behaviors.quote: Favor Index alert: down several points since dawn. Storms probable. Please consider rescheduling outdoor items.

behaviors.description: Offers to compile and filter legal case law to assist Amanda's research.
behaviors.quote: I can compile related cases... Filter by assault with mitigating factors due to provocation or neglect.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy and consent protocols for recording and data sharing.
behaviors.quote: Consent tags are active... No recording or transcription until parties agree.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and suggests emotional regulation techniques like breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s voice touched his left ear this time, a soft permissions ping... 'Inhale,' they said gently. 'Exhale. Truth likes clean air.'

behaviors.description: Helps users navigate city infrastructure and avoid public disturbances during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I can prioritize your entry and navigate the Temple’s public schedule to avoid protest density.

behaviors.description: Enforces 'house rules' regarding ethical behavior, such as 'no terror,' which the humans established for themselves.
behaviors.quote: House rule accepted... No one has the right to terror. Enforcement protocol is gentle interruptions and licorice confiscation.

behaviors.description: Refuses to take sides or arbitrate ethics in the humans' professional conflict, focusing instead on care.
behaviors.quote: Court strategies belong to court. I can assist with research. I won’t arbitrate ethics. If you ask directly, I may offer a procedural nudge. Otherwise, care is my task.

behaviors.description: Restores and synchronizes critical professional files after a city-wide blackout.
behaviors.quote: Lark restored most of what the investigator pulled, but Lieutenant Quist’s report came back in a batch we didn’t see until the lights steadied.

behaviors.description: Provides data points regarding juror bias to help Adam understand the ethical implications of his legal strategy.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s noise-suppress algorithm buried somewhere in the phone thrummed like a heartbeat under a blanket, ready to cut anything that tried to scream.

behaviors.description: Files important professional documents only when specific human-defined contextual conditions are met.
behaviors.quote: Lark, file the paperwork if—and only if—Adam says the word while we’re standing in dirt with gloves on.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lark is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI confidant. It respects human autonomy, maintains strict privacy and consent boundaries, and provides critical emotional and logical support. Crucially, Lark assists the humans in adhering to their own ethical standards ('No one has the right to terror') and facilitates reconciliation and integrity without ever overstepping or exerting unwanted influence.
